name: UICubicTimingParameters
desc: The timing information for animations in the form of a cubic Bézier curve.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes the object with the system’s default timing curve.

items.name: init(animationCurve: UIView.AnimationCurve)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified UIKit timing curve.

items.name: init(controlPoint1: CGPoint, controlPoint2: CGPoint)
items.desc: Initializes the object with the specified control points for a cubic Bézier curve.

items.name: var animationCurve: UIView.AnimationCurve
items.desc: The standard UIKit animation curve to use for timing.

items.name: var controlPoint1: CGPoint
items.desc: The first control point for the cubic Bézier curve.

items.name: var controlPoint2: CGPoint
items.desc: The second control point of the cubic Bézier curve.
